body_content.explanation: the act of making a mistake in the way that you read something, or an example of this:
examples: Faulty wiring can cause electrical problems and computer misreadings.
The scientists will now go over the script, filling in missing fragments and correcting misreadings.

body_content.explanation: the act of judging a situation wrongly, or an example of this:
examples: His misreading of the situation could have serious consequences.
Stop engaging in all these misreadings of what went on.
